description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nTrauma Prevention:
When your creatures gain a {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER}, the strength of the {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} is increased by an amount equal to 25% of their Maximum {STAT_health}. This trait does not stack.
name: Serrated Blade
